name: Dr.Sridevi UK
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - Bharathiar University   - 1998M.C.A  - Bharathiar University   - 2001Ph.D  ( Computer Science )  - Anna University  - 12/10/2012Supervisor: Dr.N.Nagaveni
in_brief: Dr.Sridevi.U.K   is an Assistant Professor (Sl.Gr) in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore. She has over 18 years of experience in teaching. Her research interest include Information Retrieval, Data Mining and Data Analytics.  She has around 15 publications in various Journals, Book Chapters and International/National Conference Proceedings. She is a recognized Research Supervisor in Anna University, Chennai

publications.journal: International Journal Of System Assurance Engineering And Management
publications.title: A recent review of ransomware attacks on healthcare industries

A study of automatic segmentation of White Matter Hyperintensity for detection of Alzheimer’s disease
